Oct 28 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:: *3I ANNOUNCES SALE OF MAGNITUDE SOFTWARE GENERATING PROCEEDS OF $477M, MM OF 2.6X AND IRR OF 47% *3I GROUP - 3I WILL MAKE A CO-INVESTMENT OF C.$50M INTO INSIGHTSOFTWARE


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 28-OCT-202111:39:16 GMT
